vote.title: To appoint Kym Douglas, Director, Columbus Department of Neighborhoods, 1410 Cleveland Avenue, Columbus, OH 43211, to serve on the Neighborhood Design Center Board, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in her official capacity, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or she resigns (profile attached).
vote.description:
Title
Â 
To appoint Kym Douglas, Director, Columbus Department of Neighborhoods, 1410 Cleveland Avenue, Columbus, OH 43211, to serve on the Neighborhood Design Center Board, to represent the City of Columbus' interests, in her official capacity, until such time as the appointment is rescinded or she resigns (profile attached).
